backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, timed sessions, permissions, and feedback with session timers and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authenticated and profile-protected routes wrapped in theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Login/logout UI using Internet Identity with a dropdown for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard redirecting unauthenticated users to login with loading handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Route guard ensuring users have created a profile before accessing protected pages.
frontend/src/components/feedback/StarRat: Interactive or readonly star rating component with hover effects.
Shared layout wrapper adding navbar, footer, and background gradient around page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info, social links, and a dynamic year plus caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Implements a responsive navigation bar with links, theme toggle, auth buttons, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: Displays four feature cards highlighting platform capabilities like live classes and smart matching.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Shows a three‑step explanation of how the platform works using icon cards and step indicators.
Card component showing a match’s name, skills, rating, credit cost, and a button to book a session.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: A toggle button that switches between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile operations, session start, and feedback submission using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionsLocal.ts: React hook managing per-identity localStorage sessions with add and remove helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTimer.ts: Implements a simple session timer hook with start, stop, and reset, tracking elapsed seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing user profile, credits, skills, ratings, quick actions, and upcoming sessions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, marketing sections, testimonials, and actions to learn or teach.
frontend/src/pages/LiveClassPage.tsx: Live session interface with timer, mock video area, session start/stop logic, and feedback submission.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with redirect handling and a simple sign‑in UI.
frontend/src/pages/SignupProfilePage.tsx: Signup form allowing users to enter a name, add skills, and create their profile.
frontend/src/pages/SkillMatchPage.tsx: React page that displays mock skill match cards with search, category filters, and booking logic storing sessions locally.
frontend/src/utils/creditCalculation.ts: Provides a deterministic credit calculation function based on duration and rating with basic validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Skill Sync’s goals, features, requirements, and current architectural notes.
